title: Apc
description: Raw-data from door-sensor for later evaluation.

traceId.description: A unique identifier to be able to trace this message. Also used to detect duplicate messages received.

doorRef.description: Stable alfa-numeric reference that is unique within scope of vehicle (vehicle element/train set). Could be a door-number or a combination of coach number and door number.

alightingCount.description: Total number of alighting passengers detected by this sensor since last reset.

boardingCount.description: Total number of boarding passengers detected by this sensor since last reset.

eventTimestamp.description: As specified in the [ADT documentation.](https://adt.transhub.io). Reflects the current UTC time.

messageNumber.description: Sequence number, increased by one for each new message. Used to validate consistency in the data stream.

categoryActivities.description: A list describing APC activity at each individual door divided per handled object category.

categoryRef.description: Object class reference. Any of the following object categories.

alightingCount.description: Number of alighting of this category detected by this sensor since last reset.

boardingCount.description: Number of boarding of this category detected by this sensor since last reset.
